text: legends of men and women capable of
changing themselves into animal form
have appeared for thousands of years in
almost every culture around the world
France and Germany in particular were
said to have been terrorized by plagues
of werewolves wreaking havoc on innocent
villages more recently a new subculture
has developed of people who believe that
they are psychologically connected to
the spirit of the wolf as I grew older I
started to realize that probably it
wasn't normal that I was still wanting
to wear a tail shortly after I was 20
years old it was winter and it was
snowing and I was out somewhere a lot
like this and there was a full moon I
couldn't sleep and went outside and just
let it go and I was running around on
all fours howling and stalking things
and when I finally came out of it I
stopped and said this is it normal after
a while I just didn't care I'll do
whatever the wolf feels like doing
members of this society typically refer
to themselves as theory ins and gather
together for regular group house we all
live together in a big community could
just to get away from humanity to be
with other people to understand where
you can feel like you can go up and lick
somebody or bite somebody and nobody
thinks twice about it because they all
know it's not like you know if you did
that to somebody in the normal world
they'd look at you like you're a freak
there is a long history of shamans who
believe they could take on the
consciousness of an animal and many
within the theory and community also
believe they have a spirit or soul that
is part animal there's a lot of
different theories to why we're who we
are and how we are who we are and
whether we dealt with the past life as
our particular animal and part of that
past life just kind of hanging with us
and confusing us a lot or whether souls
are meant to be reincarnated
within a certain animal
and a mistake is made and hey you're a
human this time oops sorry
having set up camp in the Rocky
Mountains the group prepared themselves
for their transformation we saw the elk
coming up here you know all of us were
just like elk I want to go chase if you
see you know rabbits or anything that's
your natural prey you're going to want
to go chase it
